789550.name: Bright Bob
789550.description:
Bright Bob

- a Fascinating and colorful game of skill and reaction, Bob only has time to blink :)
Our hero, bright-eyed Bob, randomly came on the scene, and there is lawlessness: Drop boxes, safes, nails and hammers! Try not to fall under the impact of these items!

game Features:
- Catch the bonus Life and the stars
- The game has a variety of play: career and score game.
- Compete against friends because the game has built-in high score table
- Train reaction
789550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
